headline: Is Tapestry (TPR) Pricing Make Sense After A 75% One Year Share Price Surge
summary: If you are wondering whether Tapestry's current share price really lines up with its underlying value, this article will walk through what the numbers actually say. The stock last closed at US$126.91, with returns of 0.6% over 7 days, a 1.7% decline over 30 days, a 1.7% decline year to date, and a 75.4% gain over the past year, as well as very large gains over 3 and 5 years that may have changed how the market views its potential and risk. Recent coverage has focused on Tapestry as a key...
